#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType UID.

== Name ==

[CUID UID]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--UID (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Allow an application to insert a unique identifier for a GolfML entity.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...  `application.dotname`=xs:string>
          [Sstring string]
  </...>
